Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory274.png'}
{3: 'The ground begins to tremble after Huaxu enters the circular contraption, which appears to be a platform lift.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "Is this one of Huaxu's traps?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "No point trying to be safe in the enemy's den. If Huaxu wanted to harm us, it would've been done already.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'While everyone is still hesitant, the platform rattles and begins to descend.'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "No time to waste. We won't make it if we don't hop on now.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'No holding back!', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory273.png'}
{3: 'The slow and steady rumbles follow as the platform descends, looming closer toward the dueling Ascendants underneath.'}
{3: "Roland barely escapes Alpha's strike to his throat, but her blade carries such intense energy that it still leaves a cut on his face."}
{3: 'It may just be a light wound, but the difference in their strength has nonetheless had Roland concerned.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'α', 3: 'Should we go on? I can let you go if you stop now.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: "I never wanted to do this, but you're the one who branded me a traitor and started swinging your knife.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'α', 3: "You're still of use to Luna, so I can let you go for the time being. But if you're in a hurry to die, I can make that happen as well.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: "I don't think that's necessary—", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: 'Gray Raven has arrived at the target destination.'}
{3: "Following Huaxu's emotionless announcement, the platform lift reaches its lowest level, its rusting gears clashing together in an earsplitting noise."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: "Now that your real guests have arrived, I'll excuse myself.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'To demonstrate my loyalty, allow me to share my humble insight.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'Be careful of that Lucia.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'α', 3: "You're telling me to watch out for her?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "She'll get stronger and stronger. You, on the other hand, are no longer impeccable.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'α', 3: 'What are you trying to say?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'My apologies, that was untoward. But I offered my advice in sincerity instead of mockery...', 4: '1'}
{3: "Before Alpha's blade arrives and carves into him, Roland leaps into the darkness with a teasing sneer and disappears, leaving her by herself as you four step out of the platform."}
{2: 'α', 3: "I'll offer you a painless death... before you make the same mistake.", 4: '2'}
